entry.title: New JavaScript Malware Targeted 50,000+ Users at Dozens of Banks Worldwide

The activity cluster, which employs JavaScript web injections, is estimated to have led to at least 50,000 infected user sessions spanning North America, South America, Europe, and Japan.

entry.title: Intel, AMD, ARM Chips At Risk From SLAM Attack
entry.summary: Researchers from the Netherlands-based Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (VUSEC) recently published their findings over a new attack that could potentially affect Intel, AMD, and ARM chips altogether. The vulnerability is known as the Spectre based on Linear Address Masking, or SLAM for short.
